
# Paylike 
![paylike](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/paylike/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `paylike` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Paylike 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Paylike is a one-stop payment solution with a zero-hassle, instant setup process. Currently, we are targeting developers, SaaS companies and tech startups with a super elegant API for integration. Concurrently we are working on several shopping carts to expand to more regular webshops.
